attributes.action: Amend the law to ensure all individuals convicted of murder spend the rest of their life in prison
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you take the life of someone else in committing an act of murder, you should spend the rest of your life in prison. Too many lenient sentences are handed out in this country to individuals who are convicted of murder. The consistent penalty should be life in prison with life meaning life and not sentences of 15 years with options of parole. Life in prison. No possibility of parole. End of story.
